name: SSH Service
description: Ensures sshd is active; skips gracefully if absent.
check_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null; then systemctl is-active sshd || echo skip; elif command -v service >/dev/null; then service ssh status 2>/dev/null | grep -q running && echo active || echo skip; else echo skip; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null; then systemctl restart sshd || true; elif command -v service >/dev/null; then service ssh restart || true; fi
